lyric:
[by:IM花花]
[00:15.85]You call me on a lazy afternoon
[00:23.16]Asking me what I'm up to
[00:26.06]Let's find something to do
[00:29.06]Baby I'd be down, down, down
[00:31.29]Down, down, down, down, down, down
[00:36.26]You know I'd be down, down, down
[00:38.39]Down, down, down, down, down, down
[00:45.35]I see you arriving in your car
[00:51.84]Jet black Mercedes, built in the 70s
[00:55.53]Classic like you and me
[00:58.57]I'll be coming down, down, down
[01:00.40]Down, down, down, down, down, down
[01:05.85]I'll be coming down, down, down
[01:07.98]Down, down, down, down, down, down
[01:13.04]I feel a little rush
[01:16.69]I think I've got a little crush on you
[01:20.39]I hope it's not too much
[01:23.87]But babe when I'm with you, I hear it
[01:26.98]My heart singing
[01:28.71]La, la, la, la, la, la, la, la-la
[01:36.05]La, la, la, la, la, la, la, la-la
[01:43.43]Honestly I shouldn't waste time no more
[01:51.78]Cause all these little boys you're chasing, did they break your heart?
[01:57.30]I know you've been down, down, down
[01:59.62]Down, down, down, down, down, down
[02:04.73]I won't let you down, down, down
[02:06.92]Down, down, down, down, down, down
[02:11.98]I feel a little rush
[02:15.42]I think I've got a little crush on you
[02:19.17]I hope it's not too much
[02:22.73]But babe when I'm with you, I hear it
[02:25.70]My heart singing
[02:27.53]La, la, la, la, la, la, la, la-la
[02:34.78]La, la, la, la, la, la, la, la-la
[02:41.91]I see you the same
[02:45.06]I see it in the way that you behave around me
[02:49.67]And I can't tell
[02:52.35]What we have is different from anyone else
[02:56.70]Cause you stop doing what you're doing
[03:00.29]When I call you come to me running
[03:03.48]And I would do the same for you
[03:07.93]So tell me that you feel it too
[03:10.57]I feel a little rush
[03:14.38]I think I've got a little crush on you
[03:18.08]I hope it's not too much
[03:21.79]But babe when I'm with you, I hear it
[03:24.47]My heart singing
[03:26.39]La, la, la, la, la, la, la, la-la
[03:33.69]La, la, la, la, la, la, la, la-la
[03:41.19]I think I've got a crush, babe
[03:43.57]Crush on you too
[03:44.85]Feel a little rush, baby
[03:47.44]And I feel it too
[03:48.65]I think I've got a crush, babe
[03:50.87]Crush on you too
[03:52.30]Feel a little rush, baby
tlyric:
[by:MMVXIIV]
[00:15.85]慵懒的午后  你拨通电话
[00:23.16]问我在做些什么
[00:26.06]不如一起吧
[00:29.06]但亲爱的
[00:31.29]我恐怕要拒绝你
[00:36.26]你知道的
[00:38.39]近日来我情绪有些低落
[00:45.35]看见你驱车而来
[00:51.84]那种七零年代的曜黑色奔驰
[00:55.53]像你我一般雅致
[00:58.57]好吧
[01:00.40]你稍稍等一下
[01:05.85]我就要下楼了
[01:07.98]就要下楼了
[01:13.04]感觉有些匆忙
[01:16.69]我想我已经有点爱慕你了
[01:20.39]希望还没陷得太深
[01:23.87]但是亲爱的  和你一起的时候
[01:26.98]我总听见自己的心唱着悠扬的歌曲
[01:28.71]la la la
[01:36.05]la la la
[01:43.43]说实在的  我不应再浪费时间
[01:51.78]你追的那些小男生
他们有没有让你伤心
[01:57.30]我也知道
[01:59.62]最近你不大高兴
[02:04.73]但和我一起
[02:06.92]你绝不会失望
[02:11.98]虽然有些仓促
[02:15.42]我想我已经因你而心动了
[02:19.17]希望还没陷得太深
[02:22.73]但亲爱的姑娘  和你一起的时候
[02:25.70]我老是听见心脏唱着欢快的歌曲
[02:27.53]la la la
[02:34.78]la la la
[02:41.91]如果你也感同身受
[02:45.06]我知道你在我面前的表现纯属自然反应
[02:49.67]我不能张扬
[02:52.35]他人难懂我们之间的微妙
[02:56.70]放手那些琐屑吧
[03:00.29]给你打电话  你马上奔向我
[03:03.48]我也愿意向你靠近
[03:07.93]所以向我坦白你也一样喜欢我吧
[03:10.57]尽管有点匆忙
[03:14.38]但我想我已经为你倾心
[03:18.08]希望还没陷得太深
[03:21.79]但是亲爱的  和你一起的时候
[03:24.47]我的心在歌唱
[03:26.39]la la la
[03:33.69]la la la
[03:41.19]已为你恍惚 亲爱的
[03:43.57]我亦是如此
[03:44.85]这感觉来得些许匆忙
[03:47.44]和你感同身受
[03:48.65]已为你倾心 亲爱的
[03:50.87]我亦如此
[03:52.30]这感觉来得些许仓促
